27 // %Tag(FULLTEXT)%
28 // %Tag(ROS_HEADER)%
29 #include "ros/ros.h"
30 // %EndTag(ROS_HEADER)%
31 // %Tag(MSG_HEADER)%
32 #include "std_msgs/String.h"
33 // %EndTag(MSG_HEADER)%
34 
35 #include <sstream>
36 
40 int main(int argc, char **argv)
41 {
52 // %Tag(INIT)%
53  ros::init(argc, argv, "talker");
54 // %EndTag(INIT)%
55 
61 // %Tag(NODEHANDLE)%
62  ros::NodeHandle n;
63 // %EndTag(NODEHANDLE)%
64 
82 // %Tag(PUBLISHER)%
83  ros::Publisher chatter_pub = n.advertise<std_msgs::String>("chatter", 1000);
84 // %EndTag(PUBLISHER)%
85 
86 // %Tag(LOOP_RATE)%
87  ros::Rate loop_rate(0.5);
88 // %EndTag(LOOP_RATE)%
89 
94 // %Tag(ROS_OK)%
95  int count = 0;
96  while (ros::ok())
97  {
98 // %EndTag(ROS_OK)%
102 // %Tag(FILL_MESSAGE)%
103  std_msgs::String msg;
104 
105  std::stringstream ss;
106 
107  if(count==1) {
108  ss << "hello eteration team for " << count << "st time!" ;
109  }
110  if(count==2) {
111  ss << "hello eteration team for " << count << "nd time!" ;
112  }
113  if(count==3) {
114  ss << "hello eteration team for " << count << "rd time!" ;
115  }
116  if(count>3) {
117  ss << "hello eteration team for " << count << "th time!" ;
118  }
119  msg.data = ss.str();
120 
121 // %EndTag(FILL_MESSAGE)%
122 
123 // %Tag(ROSCONSOLE)%
124  ROS_INFO("%s", msg.data.c_str());
125 // %EndTag(ROSCONSOLE)%
126 
133 // %Tag(PUBLISH)%
134  chatter_pub.publish(msg);
135 
136 // %EndTag(PUBLISH)%
137 
138 // %Tag(SPINONCE)%
139  ros::spinOnce();
140 // %EndTag(SPINONCE)%
141 
142 // %Tag(RATE_SLEEP)%
143  loop_rate.sleep();
144 // %EndTag(RATE_SLEEP)%
145  ++count;
146  }
147 
148 
149  return 0;
150 }
151 // %EndTag(FULLTEXT)%
152 
main
int main(int argc, char **argv)
